link.script: window.setTimeout(function () { document.title = "Home - Huntingdon Special School District"; }, 500);

em.strong: "Huntingdon Special School District will be following the governor's recommendation to remain closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. While this does not allow us time to accomplish everything we had hoped for our students, we believe it is the best decision for the health and safety of our students and our community. Please continue to check our Facebook page and this website for additional information."

span.span: Our student meal program will resume on Tuesday, April 21. Meals will be distributed from 11:30-1:00 at Huntingdon Middle School on the following dates:

span.em: *Please click on the links below for weekly updates from each school

p.span: Beginning Monday, April 20th phone lines will be open at the district office and all 3 schools from 9:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m. If you need information or have questions please call:

span.em: *please click on the links below to access resources

div.div: Revolutionary advances in information technology are transforming libraries and societies.
